description:
A durable probe for the heavy use of ski guiding, patrolling and those accessing deep terrain. An integrated stuff sack with non-slip grip provides fast, one-pull deployment in emergency situations.

  • Ferrules offer very fast deployment and high durability
  • Stuff sack integrates with the probe’s pull cord for one-pull readiness
  • Non-slip grip provides secure purchase, even with wet gloves
  • Oversized, durable alloy tip improves probing sensitivity by creating a larger hole
  • High visibility scale features 1cm increments
name: Black Diamond Quickdraw Pro Probe 320 - Unisex
